title: Did Donald Trump call himself "the second coming of God, "" the chosen one " or" the king of Israel "?
subtitle: Many memes on the Internet and news reports were played from the comments made by President 45 in a series of statements in August 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: On August 21, 2019, American President Donald Trump expressed his belief that he was "the chosen one," "the king of Israel," or "the second coming of God."
